p: Our team meets on Tuesdays in rooms Taub 8 & Taub 9. Our meetings typically consist of a 15-minute keynote, after which we split into two tracks:
Getting Started- introductory lectures followed by solving beginner CTFs.
Competition Preparation- solving advanced CTFs in preparation for competitions.
Introduction to CTF Character Encoding, Unix Shell
Binary, decimal and hexadecimal conversion table
🚩 PicoGym- filter for "General Skills". We recommend doing challenges that have 80%+ rating.
🚩 PicoGym- filter for "Web Exploitation". We recommend doing challenges that have 80%+ rating.
